metadata.name: Local Groups Discovery - MacOs
metadata.comment: Detects enumeration of local system groups

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dscacheutil')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-q')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('group')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/cat')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/etc/group')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dscl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-list')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/groups'))))

output.summary: Detects enumeration of local system groups

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1069.001/T1069.001.md
